alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Franklin; Essex; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:01PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lamoille, northwestern Caledonia, Orleans, west central Essex, north central Washington and east central Franklin Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1200 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hyde Park Village, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport City, Island Pond, Morrisville, Orleans, Derby Center, Greensboro, Charleston, Johnson Village, Jay, Newport Town, Jay In Franklin County, Eden, Westmore, Orleans Village, Stowe, Glover, Brownington, Albany, Hyde Park and Wolcott. This includes Interstate 91 between mile markers 149 and 173. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central, northeastern and northwestern Vermont.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Franklin; Essex; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington
